divs: sighting detailsi am an early riser and usually up by 3-3:30 every a.m.drink morning coffee and take my heartmeds.i am retired,but the last 15 years of work i had to be on my job by 4:30. the point of this is that i am not fuzzy or groggy at this time, but wide awake.one of my early a.m. rituals is to put the dog out and to go out into the back yard,check things out,& out of habit,i always look up into the night sky. we lived on lake erie for many years and i had many night of star-gazing with a meade telescope,along with a few friends, telling stories by campfire,night-fishing,etc. i made a point of always being out during the annual meteor showers.we were also fortunate to have a long period of observation of the halle-bop comet for a while. northern lights fromm time to time and random shooting stars,eclipse of moon\sun,the space-station and space shuttle tethered together(awesome & huge) satelites and so on.over the years we have seen a lot of things,but nothing that i ever felt defied an explanation. well,i finally have to say that i observed something that i cannot understand. i know what i saw, but i do not know what i saw.looking up towards the west i noticed (2) objects traveling at an incredible speed.they were at distance that made it obvious that they were in outer space.they were flying in a staggered formation (as you might observe (2)fighter jets with a lead plane & his wing-man) as i watched i did notice that there were tails or trails behind both craft,which looked as if they were on a string.i say craft as they appeared to be under contolled flight and their distance and positions never changed and neither did their flight path or trajectory.i also know they were unlike anything i had ever seen beforei know they were not in earths' atmosphere as their trails or contrails never expanded the way you can observe when jets go across the horizon or long distances at high altitude.it was clear, venus was brilliant above the eastern horizon,the moon was in a new phase not quite a half shape,but very bright under the conditions.i had to adjust my view as my neighbors roof was about to obscure my view, and as i moved with my sight still affixed on these craft i was starting to lose sight of them as they were heading in an easterly direction into the moon light and there was a brilliant large flash off to the left, and slightly below the moon. the (2) craft were gone!!i think that between the moonlight and the suddeness of the flash distracted me enough that i completely lost track of their vectors\trajectory.the flash appeared circular not streaking like a meteorite.when i first seen the (2) bogies i immediately dismissed them as aircraft as they were obviously far out in outer space,& my next thought was that they might be missles or rockets but their was no glow or brightness you would expect to see and i do not believe they were asteroids as both craft appeared identical in size\shape & never deviated from the path they were on.also, i re-iterate they were going at a speed that i had never seen before.i have never seen anything go from horizon to horizon in under 20-30 seconds tops! that was the entire length of time it took these objects to disappear from my line of sight\field of view..i did do some investigating and made a few inquiries into observable satelites\paths\positions and i did discover that in the nw quadrant of my viewing area that at 4:40 a.m. eastern standard time a positioned satelite had deployed(opened) an irridium solar panel at the time of my sighting.furthermore,the suns' positioning relative to the angle of the earths' curvature would have been sufficient to have reflected off of the solar panel and created the flash that i witnessed.this eliminated in my mind a lot of the wild ideas that immediately came to mind from watching too many episodes of star trek, battlestar gallactica,star wars,etc. my first thought was that they had "jumped" to warp speed or hyper-drive or what-ever...i've always had a wild imagination but i am not given to exageration or half or untruths.i saw what i saw.i have never in my life ever told anything like this and i am quite confident that i could take a polygraph or any other test and it would show that i am being completely truthful.i am not on any meds(except for my heart) never been diagnosed with any mental disorders...my wife might beg to differ though....never had any halucinations or heard voices or etc;etc;etc....i am curious though if any one else saw what i did.i also wonder if our gov't. tracked them or if neos had any info....or tracking info...that's about it.i wish i had an exciting story to tell but this was and is exciting enough for me to believe that this was of an intelligent design\happening....unless someone can add an irrefutable explanation for what i witnessed .thanks for your time to read this. 9 truthful
